summary: There are some ported resources from my Oblivion/Nehrim mod. It contains a Orient Coffee Set, few tables, a chair, pillow, sack of coffee, coffee cups and bowl, sugar pot, plate and abacus.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS]Name: Orient Set
Version: 1.0
Date: 05/02/2015
Category: Modders resource
Requirements: Skyrim
Author: Garnet

[/font][center][font=Comic Sans MS]
[img]http://i945.photobucket.com/albums/ad291/garnet_photo/coffeeset_zpszehyyuzx.png[/img]
[/font][/center][font=Comic Sans MS]

There are some ported resources from my Oblivion/Nehrim mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/43632/?]( http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/43632/? )[/url] It contains a Orient Coffee Set, few tables, a chair, pillow, sack of coffee, coffee cups and bowl, sugar pot, plate and abacus. The clutter is static except the drinkcoffee and ingredientcoffee that are havoked.

For easier workflow there is included the ESP with the test showroom, just type "coc aaaorienttest".


Credits
=======
Textures
-http://www.spiralgraphics.biz/genetica.htm
-http://www.plaintextures.com
-https://www.flickr.com/photos/sstarosta/sets/
-The_Funktasm - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24883/? for the cubemap

-Bethesda


Tools Used
==========

Blender
NIFSkope
Photoshop
Creation Kit
NIFUtilsSuite by Skyfox (god bless you)

Contact
=======
PM to Garnet18 at http://www.tesalliance.org or here at Nexus.


Licensing/Legal
===============

This is a resource and you can use whatever you like it. A credit would be appreciated. You may not change this entire mod and redistribute it without my permission. Endorse if you like it. -)))[/font]
author: Garnet
